comment: A performance trend set where the mark attributes are about worsening.
A represented set where the mark attributes are about a change in performance.
A represented set where the attributes of the mark are about time.
An information content entity that is about a change from a positive performance gap to a negative performance gap
A represented set where the attributes of the mark are about the methods of measuring behavior.
A object aggregate of marks.
An information content entity that is about a change from a negative performance gap to a positive performance gap
An information content entity that is about a unit of time.
A textual entity about performance levels, measures, ascribees, and time.
A performance gap set where the mark attributes are about a recipient performance level that is better than a comparator performance level.
A performance gap set where the mark attributes are about a comparator performance level that is better than the recipient performance level.
A represented set where the mark attributes are about a discrepancy between performance levels.
A represented set where the attributes of the mark are about measurements, decisions, aggregates, or calculations related to measured behavior.
A document part designed for the purpose of providing information about performance levels, measures, ascribees, and time to a recipient of an intervention.
A represented element that is born by a member of a performance set.
A represented element that is born by a member of a time set.
A represented element that is born by a member of a performance measure set.
A role born by a member of a represented set.
An attribute of the degree from which a curve deviates from a straight line.
A performance trend set where the mark attributes are about improvement.
An ascribee set where the mark attributes are about a living system.
A focal element that conveys information about identity to the recipient of the performance summary report.
An ascribee element where the mark attributes are about a living system.
A role inhering in a mark that conveys specific information to the recipient of a performance summary report realized through the acts of perception.
A represented element that is born by a member of an acribee set.
An information content entity that is a proper part of a relational information display and is concretized by a mark.
A 90th percentile benchmark that is about a peer group.
A relational information display whose display components bear some combination of sets (roles): ascribee set, performance measure set, performance set, or time set.
A comparative element that conveys information about a predetermined performance level.
A top performer benchmark that is ascribed the performance level of the 90th percentile for a population.
An information content entity that is the collection of specification and metadata associated with a generalized potential information display.
A comparative element that conveys information about a desired future performance level.
Social comparator content that is about a percentile for a performance level that is better than average.
An information content entity that displays relations between sets in a concretized collection of display components.
A comparative element that conveys information about an entity that has an attributed performance level.
A position where the distance between marks is not on the same scale.
A represented set where the mark attributes are about a change from a positive performance gap to a negative performance gap.
A position where the distance between marks is on the same scale.
A represented set where the mark attributes are about a change from a negative performance gap to a positive performance gap.
A 75th percentile benchmark that is about a peer group.
A role inhering in the set of attributes of a mark in a relational information display that share a scale type and that convey information about another entity.
Social comparator content that is about a mean performance level for a population.
An average comparator that is about a peer group.
A top performer benchmark that is ascribed the performance level of the 75th percentile for a population.
Comparator content that has been ascribed a desired future performance level.
Ascribee content that is used to identify a discrepancy with the performance level of the recipient of an intervention.
An attribute that is the amount of black content mixed with a pure color, or mixture of pure colors.
An attribute that is the amount of white content mixed with a pure color, or mixture of pure colors.
An attribute of external form or contour.
A document that is an aggregate of information content entities about performance levels, performance measures, time intervals, and ascribees.
Ascribee content that is about a living system to whom an intervention is directed.
Comparator content that has been ascribed a predetermined performance level.
Comparator content about living systems that are ascribed a performance level.
An attribute that is the quantity that expresses the extent of a two-dimensional figure or shape in a plane.
A role inhering in a mark that is disjoint with a focal element and that has the same scale type as the focal element.
An attribute of the magnitude of the degree of divergence of two things from one another.
An attribute of relation in which a thing stands with respect to another or others.
An attribute by virtue of which some thing appears to have a 'pure' color.
A performance trend that is improving
A represented set where the mark attributes are about entities that have attributed performance data.
An attribute of constitution, structure, or substance of anything with regard to its constituents or formative element.
An information carrier that can be measured, observed, or logged.
The quality of linear magnitude of any thing as measured from end to end
A quality that is the abstract measurement property of a concretized display component.
A material information bearer that is a basic visual element of a relational information display.
An information content entity that is about an entity that is ascribed a performance value.
An information content entity that is an aggregate of performance level content entities.

A scale type with two formal properties that (1) the instances can be distinguished from each other and (2) that one instance on a scale can be judged greater than, less than, or equal to another instance on the same scale.
An information content entity about a method of measuring performance.

A scale type with four formal properties that (1) the instances can be distinguished from each other and (2) that one instance on a scale can be judged greater than, less than, or equal to another instance on the same scale, that (3) the magnitude of an instance represented by a unit on the scale is the same regardless of where on the scale the unit falls and (4) an absolute zero value can indicate that nothing at all of the property being represented exists.
An information content entity that is about a change in performance

A scale type with three formal properties that (1) the instances can be distinguished from each other and (2) that one instance on a scale can be judged greater than, less than, or equal to another instance on the same scale and that (3) the magnitude of an instance represented by a unit on the scale is the same regardless of where on the scale the unit falls.
A performance trend that is worsening
A relational quality of the perceived distance between marks.
An information content entity that is about a discrepancy between performance levels.
A relational quality of the perceived general movement of a mark, or set of marks that is integrated over a time set.
A performance gap content entity having a comparator performance level that is better than its recipient performance level.
A performance gap content entity having a recipient performance level that is better than its comparator performance level
A scale type with one formal property that (1) the instances can be distinguished from each other.
An information content entity that is about the output value of a method of measuring performance.
A report designed for the purpose of providing performance summary information to a recipient of an intervention.
